modName: Dragonbone Ebonsteel HORSE Armor for Convenient Horses
summary:
Requires Convenient Horses 4.5+ by Alek and Dragonbone Ebonsteel Armor 1.1f+ by Dreogan
Replacer and non Repalcer versions available (non replacer version actually replaces the dwemer horse armor)
descriptionHtml:
have full permission from the mod creators.

Requires Convenient Horses 4.5+ by Alek and Dragonbone Ebonsteel Armor 1.1f+ by Dreogan

Dragonbone Ebonsteel Armor
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24941

Convenient Horses
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14950

Another recommended mod:

Wulfharths Dragonbone Weapons
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10171

Replacer and non Repalcer versions available.

(non replacer version actually replaces the dwemer horse armor from CH, that way you can have the two types of Dragonbone plate horse armor in the game)

Installation:

Use Nexus Mod Manager to download the mod and activate the mod.

or extrat to your Data folder directly.

Load Order:

Convinient Horses.esp
DragonBoneEbonsteel.esp
(this mod does not use esp files)

Unistallation:

Deactivate the mod whit Nexus Mod Manager

or delete the extrated files from your Data folder.
author: LICVIGO
